clients.title: Justia Company Page Gets a New Look in 2020
description: We’ve recently updated our Justia Company Page where we have made available our company announcements and information about the leadership team behind our strategy and business operations. Be sure to check out the legal resources we have available from our US Supreme Court Center to our Ask a Lawyer forums as well.
